summary: The module defines core graph neural network components built on DGL and PyTorch, including a differentiable pooling mechanism for batched graphs and an inductive neighbor-aggregation architecture. These layers compute node assignments, aggregate neighbor features, and produce hierarchical graph embeddings suitable for downstream graph learning tasks.
business_intent: Enable developers to incorporate advanced hierarchical graph representation learning, such as graph classification or clustering, into their applications by providing ready-to-use pooling and aggregation layers that work efficiently with batched graph data.
